name: The fate of being: Consciousness
description:
![]() ## Chapter I: Consciousness The fate of being is a turn based RPG campaign, split into multiple chapters with consciousness being the first one.
The campaign tells the story of a protoss clone, being genetically manipulated to become a superior being. Consciousness revolves around his questions to his life, his purpose and meaning of life in general.

What would you do if you were designed to be superior to others? Would you make use of it and risk to become a tyrant? Or would you hold your powers back, and completely live against the cause of your life?
Find out what a clone thinks about it!
